text: Tirill Mohn (born 22 February 1975) (), also known mononymously as Tirill, is a Norwegian composer, singer and violinist. She was a member of the art rock band White Willow, and has released several solo albums.Tirill – Et kretsløp av destruksjon og gjenfødsel, Norway Rock MagazineKlassisk vorspiel, NRKTirill – Nine And Fifty Swans, Metal.de Mohn is a descendant of the artists Christian Krohg and Oda Krohg. In 2019 she married the composer Marcus Paus;Asker kammermusikkfestival trekker flere og flere, Budstikka she and her husband are distantly related as both are descendants of Norway's first attorney-general Bredo Henrik von Munthe af Morgenstierne Sr."Fører tradisjonen videre," Familien, May 2019 == Discography == ;Solo albums * A Dance with the Shadows (2003) * Tales from Tranquil August Gardens (2011) * Nine and Fifty Swans (2011) * Um Himinjǫður (2013) * Said the Sun to the Moon (2019) == References == Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian composers Category:Norwegian female composers Category:Norwegian violinists Category:Norwegian songwriters
title: Tirill Mohn
